title: Earthquake
description:
Kevin talks with comedic legend EarthQuake about the origins of his name, what it’s like being a comedian’s comedian, and the time Kevin and Quake went through divorces at the same time.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds!
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (earthquake, kevin hart)
